name: gofindahusband
description:
Version 0.9

Fire Emblem: Three Houses dating-ish sim with a hint of mystery going on at the backdrop of a high school. Will you be able to figure it out the mystery that plagues the 3rd classroom block?

---

Don't mind the title, it's a joke based on Felix and Ingrid's C Support conversation. Game is also inspired from the SNES version of Tantei Famicom Detective Club. Go give it a try if you can. It's really good.
